issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. Create a new TiMobile project
2. Right-click on project
3. Go to Run As > Run Configurations
4. Select newly created project under Titanium Android Emulator
5. Change Android API to Google APIs Android 2.1
6. Click Apply and Run

Results: Default TiMob project can be launched in Android emulator with no warnings or errors
Expected: Error or warning indicating target sdk is not minimum requirement.
fields.summary: Android: SDK -  SDK minimum requirement is not being detected
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 1.8.0.1 (11/10/11 15:50 fe037e9...)
OS: Mac OS X Lion
Device: Android Emulator 2.1
Titanium Studio: 1.0.7.201111091637
